name: Crypt Mania
description:
UE Germany, Prototype made for PLAY 2019 - Monsters, made in Game Maker Studio 2 in ~15 hours of work by Philip Conberg, Bennet Kuhlmann, Jakob Panternueller and Andrea Rosini.

https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/11qjd0Y5KS2Nc-5T971QJMWe4pQtMLRSmM_Q3MGhw...

You're Napoleon Bone-Apart, a "young" and prominent skeleton in the liches' business in Phylactery management and souls gathering. As capitalism goes, the manager will seemingly look lazier and lazier as the profit grows and grows and the workers' rights shrink, you can't even leave the dungeon and have to sleep there, you're almost as overworked as a game developer! And among all of this, the customers are real a***oles: edgelord, tryhards, stereotypical, overpowered, mary sues with lazy backstories that don't appreciate good writing.

you

And now the dungeon is open 24/7 and all your coworkers are quitting and you're only there because YOU have to pay rent (probably in Berlin). 

And now the customers enter in the night acting like Karens and asking for the manager, which now has enough souls in his phylactery to sleep for millennias but despite that he still wants YOU to work more.

And yes, it rattles your bones: it's time for the rrrrevolution, but first, let's deal with the players customers (especially the wizard)

And they dare to call YOU the monster, you ulna want to sleep.

-every undead game developer ever
